entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts who is being honored by the students. He is described as having raised his goblet and murmured the name of Cedric.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who is present during Dumbledore's speech. He is mentioned as seeing Malfoy and other Slytherins refusing to honor Dumbledore.

entities.name: lord voldemort
